# Argus

> Help AI grok your codebase

Argus is a CLI tool that scans codebases and automatically generates context files for AI coding assistants.

## What it does

- Scans your codebase (tech stack, structure, patterns, conventions)
- Generates optimized context files:
  - CLAUDE.md (Claude Code)
  - .cursorrules (Cursor)
  - .github/copilot-instructions.md (GitHub Copilot)
  - .continue/config.json (Continue.dev)

## Commands

- `argus init` - Initialize configuration
- `argus scan` - Analyze codebase and generate files
- `argus sync` - Update files with changes
- `argus version` - Print version

## Tech Stack

- Language: Go
- CLI: Cobra
- Analysis: Static (AST parsing, file inspection)
- Output: Markdown, JSON, YAML

## Project Structure

- cmd/argus/ - CLI entry point
- internal/analyzer/ - Codebase analysis
- internal/detector/ - Tech/pattern detection
- internal/generator/ - Output generation
- pkg/types/ - Shared types
